EditListingInsuranceForm.insuranceExplan: BOLELO is proud to be able to offer “Product Damage Protection (PDP)”, an insurance-like product to our members so you always have a peace of mind when listing your valuables on our sharing platform. The PDP, also known as the bailment will be underwritten by one of the nation’s largest insurers The Hartford/Y-Risk.  For more detailed information, please
EditListingInsuranceForm.insuranceCovera: We are NOT able to offer a protection plan on the motorized blades, including but not limited to chain saws, table saws, reciprocating saws.  Also, aircraft of any kind, powered watercraft of any kind (including boats and jet skis), Autos of any kind (cars, trucks, snowmobiles, ATV, RV) and heavy construction related items.  There's coverage maximum value limit of $xxx

SectionHero.subTitle: Ever needed something, used it once, only to store it and never see it again? With Bolelo, that won't happen.
SectionHero.title: Need something? Why buy when you can borrow? BOLELO it!
SectionHowItWorks.createListingLink: *You can become a Bolelo member in just a few clicks!
SectionHowItWorks.part1Text: Start by searching for an item.  Once you find what you are looking for, check availability, book the item and make a secure payment right away. You can also chat with the Lender and ask questions.
SectionHowItWorks.part2Text: Post your item.  You set the price, availability, pick up time and location.  Put the things you own to work rather than just storing it. You make $$$.  Insurance protection is available for your stuff in case there’s damage.
SectionHowItWorks.part2Title: Do you have an item to Lend?
SectionHowItWorks.part3Text: BOLELO will handle the transaction and payment. You get to meet some friendly folks.  It’s good for the community, good for our environment and great for your wallet.  It's all Local, try it today.
SectionLocations.title: Borrow - Lend - Local

TransactionPanel.customerCancelBookingNo: *Rentals can be cancelled for a full refund by 6pm on the eve of the booking start date. After that, entire fee is forfeited.
TransactionPanel.providerCancelBookingNo: *You can cancel bookings by 6pm on the eve of the booking start date. You may not cancel a booking after that deadline.
TransactionPanel.providerRequestNote: *Please note that for requests made 2 days or less before the booking start date, you have until 11pm on the eve of the booking start date to accept/decline. For all other requests, these have a 48hr time window. After that, they will automatically expire.
